segment.source: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
segment.target: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.

segment.source: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.
segment.target: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.

segment.source: In module 3, use the unit of ten to make easier problems by decomposing addends and grouping them in any order. They intuitively apply the associative and commutative properties and then learn how they can use strategies such as counting on, making ten, taking from ten, subtracting to get to a ten, and relating operations to break down larger addition and subtraction problems.
segment.target: In module 3, use the unit of ten to make easier problems by decomposing addends and grouping them in any order. They intuitively apply the associative and commutative properties and then learn how they can use strategies such as counting on, making ten, taking from ten, subtracting to get to a ten, and relating operations to break down larger addition and subtraction problems.

segment.source: Properties of Operations to Make Easier Problems
segment.target: Properties of Operations to Make Easier Problems
